company_ids.description: An array of unique identifiers for the companies associated with the discussion forum.

description.description: A brief overview or summary of the discussion forum.

forum_category_id.description: The unique identifier for the category of the discussion forum.

forum_type.description: The type or classification of the discussion forum, such as Q&A, Announcement, etc.

forum_visibility.description: The visibility settings of the discussion forum, such as public, private, or restricted.

id.description: A unique identifier for the discussion forum.

name.description: The name or title of the discussion forum.

position.description: The order or position of the discussion forum in a list or hierarchy.

posts_count.description: The total count of posts within the discussion forum.

topics_count.description: The total count of topics or threads within the discussion forum.
